CATEGORY: Display and formatting functions, String functions
DESCRIPTION: Removes leading spaces from a string.
EXAMPLE: <h3>LTrim Example</h3> <cfif IsDefined("FORM.myText")> <cfoutput> <pre> Your string: "#FORM.myText#" Your string: "#LTrim(FORM.myText)#" (left trimmed) </pre> </cfoutput> </cfif> <form action = "ltrim.cfm"> <p>Type in some text, and it will be modified by LTrim to remove leading spaces from the left <p><input type = "Text" name = "myText" value = " TEST"> <p><input type = "Submit" name = ""> </form>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: A string or a variable that contains one
